DETAILS: Gender: Women Category: Accessories Outfit Type: Jewelry Sub-Category: Jewelry Set Base Material: Plastic Color Type: Dark Green Number of Pieces: 5 Piece Work Technique: Gota Work Additional Description: This exquisite collection of Handmade Gota Jewelry with Dough Work beautifully blends ancient traditions with artistic craftsmanship. Gota jewelry, renowned for its intricate gold and silver zari work, is now further enhanced with the delicate touch of dough work, a craft that has been passed down through generations. Each piece is carefully handcrafted, with fine dough designs creating patterns that reflect the essence of traditional artistry. The collection features timeless pieces such as chokers, earrings, maang tikka, and bracelets, each one designed to reflect the cultural richness and heritage of Indian craftsmanship. The vibrant dough work, often featuring floral and geometric motifs, combined with the shimmering gota zari embellishments, evokes a sense of elegance and grandeur, reminiscent of royal court jewelry. Perfect for weddings, festivals, and special occasions, this jewelry not only adds a royal charm to any outfit but also carries with it the spirit of tradition. The meticulous handcrafting and the fusion of dough work and gota create pieces that are both delicate and durable, symbolizing the beauty and heritage of our culture.
